events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will start the review process shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster for further evaluation by our technical team.
A recruiter specializing in software developer roles has been assigned to your case to guide you through the recruitment steps.
Your profile passed the initial screening phase based on your software engineering experience and relevant skills.
Thank you for promptly responding to our scheduling request for the next interview stage; we appreciate your enthusiasm for this role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 14:00 UTC with our lead software engineer.
